html.h2: Welcome to Home Monitor App. This application was built on Core Splunk to show the traffic on your network through the syslog on your cable modem router. If you need help setting up your router, please look to your provider's website for assistance.

ul.li: These views show the in bound and out bound traffic. You should download the Google Maps app and MAXMIND (free downloads via splunk.com).
Make sure to configure UDP on Splunk to accept traffic via UDP port 514, if you're going to use the raw feed from your modem.
If you need assistance, please visit Home Monitor GitHub

chart.searchString: index=homemonitor process="in" | timechart count(process) by date_wday
chart.title: Traffic by Day of the Week (Last 7 Days)

chart.searchString: index=homemonitor process="IN" NOT client_ip=192.168* | timechart count(process) by client_ip
chart.title: Last 15 minutes of IN Bound IP's
Last 15 Minutes of OUT Bound IP Address

table.searchString: index=homemonitor process="IN" NOT client_ip=192.168.* | geoip client_ip | stats sparkline count(client_ip) as Count by client_ip_country_name | sort - Count
table.title: Last 7 days Top In Bound Connections by Country

table.searchString: index=homemonitor process="IN" NOT client_ip=192.168.* | geoip client_ip | stats sparkline count(client_ip) as Count by client_ip_city | sort - Count
table.title: Last 7 days Top In Bound Connections by City

table.searchString: sourcetype=syslog process="IN" NOT client_ip=192.168.* | stats count, values(src_port) as Ports by client_ip | table client_ip Ports count | sort - count limit="10"
table.title: Last 60 Minutes In Bound IP's by number of Ports Accessing Table

table.searchString: index=homemonitor NOT client_ip=192.168* process="IN" | stats sparkline count(client_ip) as Count by src_port | sort - Count
table.title: Last 60 Minutes In Bound Ports by number of IP's
